title: Scorpions - El Paso Texas 1996 (SOUNDBOARD)
description:
Scorpions: Live In El Paso 05-06-1996 (2011 CMI Music)
SCORPIONS

LIVE IN EL PASO - A CONCERT BROADCAST

15th anniversary edition

This edition: 2011 CMI Music
Original Broadcast CDs: 1996 Atlantic Records

Running time: 1h 25m 03s

Lineage:
Silver CDs > EAC (secure mode) > WAV > Editing / Remastering > WAV > mp3

CD1:
1. Rock You Like A Hurricane
2. Bad Boys Running Wild
3. Oh Girl
4. Tease Me, Please Me
5. Loving You Sunday Morning
6. In Trance
7. Coast To Coast
8. Holiday
9. Wind Of Change
10. The Zoo
11. Alien Nation
12. Stone Cold Crazy
13. Hit Between The Eyes
14. Blackout
15. Wild Child
16. Still Loving You
17. Big City Nights
18. Credits


SCORPIONS:
Klaus Meine - vocals
Rudolph Schenker - rhythm guitars, lead guitars, backing vocals
Matthias Jabs - lead guitars, rhythm guitars, voice-box, backing vocals
Ralph Rieckermann - bass guitar, backing vocals
James Kottak - drums, backing vocals

This was the first of the Scorpions' 1996 North American Tour with the new drummer, James Kottak.

Recorded for The Album Network Concert Broadcast at The UTEP Special Events Center in El Paso, Texas, June 5, 1996 with Reelsound Recording remote truck.
Engineered and mixed by Erwin Musper, assisted by Roger Sommers at Royaltone Studios, Hollywood, CA.
